Interaction.Text: Hey, you! Who's in there?

Interaction.Name: tutorial_choice
Interaction.Text: It's me, Sadie.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_choice
Interaction.Text: Just a lowly cabin girl.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_choice
Interaction.Text: Who are you?

Interaction.Name: tutorial_01
Interaction.Text: Well hurry up and get out here! We need a hand!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_02
Interaction.Text: Does it matter? Hurry up and get out here! We need a hand!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_03
Interaction.Text: Hand?! Hand... oh, right! Crap! Still gotta clean off the Captain's hook hand...

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_start
Interaction.Text: These accusations are completely unfounded. You have no evidence whatsoever.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_01
Interaction.Text: We all know what kind of cheating, no-good scoundrel you are! It’s no coincidence! You killed the captain!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_02
Interaction.Text: All I have ever done is preserve and protect the interests of this ship.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_03
Interaction.Text: All you’ve ever done is preserve your own shady interests! And I won’t let you get away with it anymore!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_04
Interaction.Text: Hear, hear! No evildoings shall be gotten away with under the watchful eye of yours truly.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_05
Interaction.Text: Oh shut up, you fop. Go polish your gears elsewhere.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_06
Interaction.Text: Ah, mon coeur! You wound me with your wicked words!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_07
Interaction.Text: Without me, this ship would be nothing. You think the captain was leading this mess? Hardly. I’ve been captaining this ship for years while they claimed the title for it.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_08
Interaction.Text: But if you truly harbor the delusion that residing in the brig will prevent me from doing my job, then I suppose I could entertain you.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_09
Interaction.Text: I assure you, however, that you will regret addressing your superior with so little tact.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_exit_QM
Interaction.Text: That… woman! I just - I can’t- Oooooogh! She is everything that’s wrong with piracy, and nothing that’s right!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_10
Interaction.Text: I anguish at your sorrow, mademoiselle. But do not despair! I, Bartholomieu Disquefloppe IV, will carry your heavy burden as rightful captain of our beautiful ship.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_11
Interaction.Text: What? … oh, ah - no, that’s ok, Bart. I’m going to have to step up as Captain and set things straight. Just try not to cause any trouble.

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_exit_SM
Interaction.Text: Hear me, mes amis! Lend me your ears! Our dear, dashing, clever captain has perished!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_12
Interaction.Text: Those who wish to mourn their untimely passing should follow me to the helm, where we shall hold a service in their memory!

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_exit_FM
Interaction.Text: The captain is… dead? What am I supposed to do now?

Interaction.Name: tutorial_cutscene_13
Interaction.Text: Did the first mate say something about a service?
